remarks: Add disjunct to both sides of Hilbert subspace ordering.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
shincl.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
shincl.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
shless.1 $e |- C e. SH $.
shlej1i $p |- ( A C_ B -> ( A vH C ) C_ ( B vH C ) ) $.
